name: peak-vault
description: A cross platform wallet for the Hive blockchain.
author: @peak.open

scripts.dev:ext: pnpm run update:extension && concurrently --kill-others "node scripts/watch ./src ./manifests index.html" "pnpm run dev:firefox"
scripts.dev:ext:chrome: pnpm run update:extension:chrome && concurrently --kill-others "node scripts/watch ./src ./manifests index.html -t chrome" "pnpm run dev:chrome"
scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && tsup && vite build -c vite.config_ext.js
scripts.build:light: vite build && tsup && vite build -c vite.config_ext.js
scripts.update:extension: pnpm run build:light && pnpm run inject-manifest && pnpm run inject-dialogs
scripts.update:extension:chrome: pnpm run build:light && pnpm run inject-manifest chrome && pnpm run inject-dialogs
scripts.release: bash ./scripts/pre_release.sh && pnpm run build && pnpm run typedefs && bash ./scripts/release.sh && bash ./scripts/post_release.sh
